caseTitle: United Bank Limited (UBL) thr. its President, Karachi v. Jamil Ahmed & others
tagline: (1) Section 59 of the Industrial Relations Act 2012. (2) Burden of proof lies upon the employee to prove that he is ‘workman’ (3) If the concurrent findings are found in violation of law or defective then it can be reversed by the High Court in its Constitutional jurisdiction.
